hibernate-mapping.sql-query: WITH RECURSIVE hid(id, name, parentref, level) AS ( SELECT id, name, parentref, 0 as level FROM metadatastructures where id = :metadataStructureId UNION ALL SELECT c.id, c.name, c.parentref, level+1 FROM hid inner join metadatastructures as c ON hid.parentref = c.id ) SELECT u.* from hid inner join metadatapackageusages as u on hid.id = u.metadatastructureref order by hid.level DESC, u.id ;

WITH RECURSIVE hid(id, name, parentref, level) AS ( SELECT id, name, parentref, 0 as level FROM metadatastructures where id = :metadataStructureId UNION ALL SELECT c.id, c.name, c.parentref, level+1 FROM hid inner join metadatastructures as c ON hid.parentref = c.id ) SELECT u.id as id from hid inner join metadatapackageusages as u on hid.id = u.metadatastructureref order by hid.level DESC, u.id ;
